full_text: Today we will talk about hygiene. What is hygiene? It is cleanliness. Why should we save cleanliness? Because it is important to be clean in this work. So let us see how to save hygiene. The first step is to brush your teeth well before going to the booking in the morning. Clean your teeth, take bath, put deodorant, put a cloth. Why should you do all these? Because you are always around your child. Your child is very close to you. So if you smell from your body or mouth, children will not like it. They will fight with you if they do not come close to you. Or you can complain to your parents. So it is important to maintain hygiene. The second point is that you should always remember that you are going to the booking as a trained professional nanny. So you should look professional even in the clothes you wear. You can see here that the saree they are wearing does not look professional. They look like maids. So you are not a maid, you are going as a nanny. So if you wear the saree as much as you can, it will look good. Look at this, how neat it is. If you have a salwar or ID card, it looks good. So you will feel comfortable wearing this saree. Because you are always around your child. You are always sitting, talking, doing all these. So if you wear this kind of salwar, it will be very comfortable. So we are not saying that wearing saree is not a profession. But there is a way to wear it. So you can get ready like this. So remember to keep your head straight. You should always have your ID card with you. Then wear a kumkuma. We are not saying that you should not wear a kumkuma. But it is very important to know how you are going to wear a kumkuma. If you wear a big kumkuma, the children will be more afraid. So wear a small kumkuma. The first point is that you should wear the same saree daily. Then wear the same saree today and then tomorrow. Do not repeat this. It is better to wear the same saree every day. The more you wear the saree, the better it will be. Another point is that when you go home, when you go to the house where you booked, first you should know where to keep your things. Then you should know where to wash your hands after putting your things there. Then you should wash your hands. You should wash your hands using soap or hand wash. If you do not wash your hands, then what will parents think? Parents will not be able to understand their children. They will start doubting whether they will be fit for this job. So do not forget to wash your hands. Next point is that not only when you go home, but before you do any child related work, like changing the diaper, feeding the child or making food for the child, you should wash your hands cleanly before doing any kind of work. You should wash your hands cleanly after doing any kind of work. You should wash your hands after the work is over. So do not forget to wash your hands before doing any kind of work. So do not forget to wash your hands before doing any kind of work. The next point is that it is better to take your food from your house. It is better to take your food from your house. Also remember to take a napkin. Where ever you sit and eat, it will be very important to clean the place. If you have a small piece of food, then you should clean it thoroughly. If you have a small piece of food, then you should clean it thoroughly. After doing all these things, do not forget to wash your hands. Wash your hands thoroughly. If you have a small smell on your hands after eating, it will be very important to clean it thoroughly. The next point is that you should always cut your nails neatly. If you have a big nail, it will be very dangerous. Why? Because you are always playing with your children. Or you are doing some kind of massage to them. Or you are taking bath. If you do such kind of work, it will be very painful. So you should cut your nails neatly. And keep them clean. Also, you should not forget to clean your hands. This is a very important point. Now we have seen how to maintain hygiene. How to maintain cleanliness. Keep your nails clean. And come to practice from day 1.

segments.text: Today we will talk about hygiene.
What is hygiene? It is cleanliness.
Why should we save cleanliness?
Because it is important to be clean in this work.
So let us see how to save hygiene.
The first step is to brush your teeth well before going to the booking in the morning.
Clean your teeth, take bath, put deodorant, put a cloth.
Why should you do all these?
Because you are always around your child.
Your child is very close to you.
So if you smell from your body or mouth, children will not like it.
They will fight with you if they do not come close to you.
Or you can complain to your parents.
So it is important to maintain hygiene.
The second point is that you should always remember that you are going to the booking as a trained professional nanny.
So you should look professional even in the clothes you wear.
You can see here that the saree they are wearing does not look professional.
They look like maids.
So you are not a maid, you are going as a nanny.
So if you wear the saree as much as you can, it will look good.
Look at this, how neat it is.
If you have a salwar or ID card, it looks good.
So you will feel comfortable wearing this saree.
Because you are always around your child.
You are always sitting, talking, doing all these.
So if you wear this kind of salwar, it will be very comfortable.
So we are not saying that wearing saree is not a profession.
But there is a way to wear it.
So you can get ready like this.
So remember to keep your head straight.
You should always have your ID card with you.
Then wear a kumkuma.
We are not saying that you should not wear a kumkuma.
But it is very important to know how you are going to wear a kumkuma.
If you wear a big kumkuma, the children will be more afraid.
So wear a small kumkuma.
The first point is that you should wear the same saree daily.
Then wear the same saree today and then tomorrow.
Do not repeat this.
It is better to wear the same saree every day.
The more you wear the saree, the better it will be.
Another point is that when you go home,
when you go to the house where you booked,
first you should know where to keep your things.
Then you should know where to wash your hands after putting your things there.
Then you should wash your hands.
You should wash your hands using soap or hand wash.
If you do not wash your hands,
then what will parents think?
Parents will not be able to understand their children.
They will start doubting whether they will be fit for this job.
So do not forget to wash your hands.
Next point is that
not only when you go home,
but before you do any child related work,
like changing the diaper,
feeding the child or making food for the child,
you should wash your hands cleanly before doing any kind of work.
You should wash your hands cleanly after doing any kind of work.
You should wash your hands after the work is over.
So do not forget to wash your hands before doing any kind of work.
So do not forget to wash your hands before doing any kind of work.
The next point is that
it is better to take your food from your house.
It is better to take your food from your house.
Also remember to take a napkin.
Where ever you sit and eat,
it will be very important to clean the place.
If you have a small piece of food,
then you should clean it thoroughly.
If you have a small piece of food, then you should clean it thoroughly.
After doing all these things, do not forget to wash your hands.
Wash your hands thoroughly.
If you have a small smell on your hands after eating,
it will be very important to clean it thoroughly.
The next point is that
you should always cut your nails neatly.
If you have a big nail, it will be very dangerous.
Why? Because you are always playing with your children.
Or you are doing some kind of massage to them.
Or you are taking bath.
If you do such kind of work,
it will be very painful.
So you should cut your nails neatly.
And keep them clean.
Also, you should not forget to clean your hands.
This is a very important point.
Now we have seen how to maintain hygiene.
How to maintain cleanliness.
Keep your nails clean.
And come to practice from day 1.
